job.title: Data Scientist
job.industry: Marketing and Advertising,Information Technology and Services,Computer Software
job.description: Nice to meet youbrbrSimply put were a growth firm Leading companies hire us to help their organizations reach their full potential by putting people first and creating change that matters How you ask We help our clients find and engage new markets amp customers pioneer new ventures and create new products services and business models that will transform their organizationsbrbrstronguWho We WantbrbrustrongWe love passionately curious people who think of themselves as lifelong learners They are humble engaging and intelligent They have strong opinions with open minds They are proactive and entrepreneurialbrbrCritical thinking is their sharpest tool and they fearlessly tackle tough problems They understand that understanding is a key part of building trust and driving positive outcomes Thats why they lead with empathymotivating internally and externally and having the hard conversations when neededbrbrThey believe that teams do it best and the best outcomes come from hearing perspectives that arent their own At Three Five Two we push for everyone to find and use their voice and respecting each others is nonnegotiablebrbrstrongWhats the Day to Day RolebrbrstrongWe are looking for a Data Scientist to help our clients and internal teams interpret and act on their data You will work alongside diverse teams of passionate strategists researchers developers designers and marketers to create comprehensive business strategies and digital solutions Your clients could include SaaS products startups Fortune 100 companies and morebrbrWe are looking for someone with a solid blend of technical aptitude strategic thinking and great communication skillsbrbrstronguRequirementsbrustrongul li2 years working in a data science roleli liComfortable using SQL and working with data across disparate complex data sourcesli liStrong knowledge of Python or Rli liStrong understanding of applied statistics and machine learning algorithms including methodologies for regressions classification clustering and causalityli liExcellent ability to interpret problems synthesize analysis and present information in an effective wayli liAble to confidently build data science driven solutions to understand and solve business challengesli liStrong communication skills and comfort working directly with partners and clientsli liEnthusiasm for learning and desire to develop new skillsli brulstrongExtra Creditbrstrongul liExperience with experimental design and AB Testing analysisli liComfortable using BI tools including Tableau and PowerBIli liExperience working directly with software development teams and deploying data science solutionsli liPrevious consulting or professional services experienceli brbrulustrongBenefitsbrbrstronguWhat Youll Getbrul liFreedom We trust you to do your thing and do it wellli liProfessional Development We set aside a training budget because we want to invest in youli liBenefits Health and dental insurance employermatch 401K retirement program PTO policy and moreli brulstrongA few more important things we as a company support understand amp value brstrongul liBlack lives matterli liGreat ideas and talent can come from anywhereli liNontraditional paths are OKli liSo are traditional onesli brulWe welcome people from all backgrounds who seek the opportunity to help build a future where everyone and everything can move independently If you have curiosity passion and collaborative spirit work with us and lets move the world forward togetherbrbrThree Five Two is an
